Title:
A Hybrid Reverse Engineering Platform Combining Metrics and Program Visualization
Authors:
Serge Demeyer, Stéphane Ducasse and Michele Lanza
Download:
[ index | compressed postcript | PDF ]
Bibliographic reference:
Serge Demeyer, Stéphane Ducasse and Michele Lanza, "A Hybrid Reverse Engineering Platform Combining Metrics and Program Visualization," working paper, February, 1999.
Abstract:
The reverse engineering of large scale object-oriented legacy systems is a challenging task with a definite demand for tool support. Unfortunately, two of the most promising approaches for reverse engineering tools (namely, program visualization and metrics) are either too complex to scale up or too simplistic to be practible. This paper investigates a hybrid approach, combining the immediate appeal of visualizations with the scalability of metrics. We propose CodeCrawler as an experimental platform that allows us to explore which combinations work in practice.
